channel.title: Kernel on Ragnar
channel.description: Recent content in Kernel on Ragnar

item.title: Deep Graph Kernels
item.description: Deep Graph Kernels In this notebook I will be constructing a deep graph kernel based on this paper. It utilizes the Weisfeiler-Lehman isomorphism test algorithm and/or the shortest-path algorithm. The kernel is then used for graph classification. The code is taken from jcatw which again cites Pinar Yanardag as the original author. The code is adjusted to accommodate the networkx library and python 3. import networkx as nx import pandas as pd import numpy as np import re from nltk.
